long_description: Double-wall, 3-season MSR Elixir 2 Tent combines generous living space with lightweight backcountry performance to create a durable, comfortable wilderness shelter for you and your backpacking buddy. Lightweight design weighs in at just 4 lbs. 10 oz.-or set up in fast and light mode (rainfly, poles and included footprint) for only 3 lbs. 9 oz. Unique pole geometry optimizes head and elbow room for livable space and fits two 25 in. wide mats (sold separately); adaptable rainfly allows for excellent view. 2 large doors and vestibules offer easy access. Freestanding system features color-coded poles, clips and webbing for fast and easy setup.
short_description: Double-wall, 3-season MSR Elixir 2 Tent combines generous living space with lightweight backcountry performance to create a durable, comfortable wilderness shelter for you and your backpacking buddy.
